articles.description: The motorcycle, which was previously available in five matte colours, now gets two more paint options.
articles.content:
- Yezdi Roadster now available in seven colours
- New paint options priced at Rs 2,01,142
- No changes to design, specifications, and features

articles.title: Govt considers selling at least 51% of state-backed IDBI Bank: Report - Business Standard
articles.description: Authorities plan to sell at least some of the government and LICs stakes in IDBI Bank and cede management control
articles.content:
India’s government is considering selling at least 51 per cent of state-backed IDBI Bank Ltd., according to people with knowledge of the matter.
